mapper.sql: id, template_code, start_warehouse_id, province_id, city_id, area_id, weight_down, weight_up, unit_price, first_weight, first_weight_price, continued_weight, continued_price, weight_limit, timeliness, temperature_type_code, product_case, area_type_code, deliverid, mark, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time, del_flag, service_type_code
mapper.select:
select
from bms_quote_dispatch_detail where 1=1 and del_flag = '0'
limit 1
SELECT id FROM price_dispatch_template where template_code=#{temid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into bms_quote_dispatch_detail(template_code, start_warehouse_id, province_id, city_id, area_id, weight_down, weight_up, unit_price, first_weight, first_weight_price, continued_weight, continued_price, weight_limit, timeliness, temperature_type_code, product_case, area_type_code, deliverid, mark, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time, del_flag, service_type_code) values ( #{templateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startWarehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weightDown,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{weightUp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{firstWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{firstWeightPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{continuedWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{continuedPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{weightLimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{timeliness,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{temperatureTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productCase,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliverid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
